General.Name: Zhejiang Reclaim Construction Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Reclaim Construction Group Co., Ltd. engages in the seawall construction business in China. It undertakes water conservancy, hydro power project construction, port and waterway engineering, housing construction, and municipal engineering construction projects, as well as provides blasting and dismantling professional contract services. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Ningbo, China.
